data.title: Berlin Tegel (Otto Lilienthal) Airport (TXL) Information: TXL Airport in Berlin Area, Germany
meta_keywords: citys number one airport berlin tegel international airport txl located tegel area next tegeler lake within reinickendorf district conveniently situated just mere 9 km / 6 miles north-west berlin tegel airport appeals both business visitors tourists due central location
data.meta_description: The city's number one airport, Berlin Tegel International Airport (TXL) is located in the Tegel area, next to Tegeler Lake and within the Reinickendorf district.  Conveniently situated just a mere 9 km / 6 miles to the north-west of Berlin, Tegel Airport appeals to both business visitors and tourists, due to its central location.
